video.title: Odd Squad
video.synopsis: When bizarre things happen around town, young agents Olive, Otto and the rest of the Odd Squad use their wits and math skills to solve the case.

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of zeros creates mayhem and turns Otto into a baby; Olive and Otto try to reverse the Bears basketball team's strange bad luck.
episodes.title: Zero Effect / Bad Luck Bears

episodes.synopsis: Otto grows obsessed with a Soundcheck song while on a case with Olive; Suddenly, there are four Delivery Debbies ... and one of them has disappeared!
episodes.title: Soundcheck / Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Olive and Otto investigate a series of vandalism incidents against symmetrical objects; Objects and people vanish from an Italian restaurant.
episodes.title: My Better Half / The Confalones

episodes.synopsis: Olive and Otto race a rival team to find a blob that's loose in Odd Squad HQ; The squad tries to figure out why no one in town can count backwards.
episodes.title: Blob on the Job / Party of 5,4,3,2,1

episodes.synopsis: While Olive and Otto look for Santa's missing reindeer, Oscar helps Ms. O get back on Santa's "nice" list in this holiday-themed episode.
episodes.title: Reindeer Games

episodes.synopsis: Oscar's look-alike robots wander into town; Otto and Olive investigate when townsfolk start getting covered in stripes and plaid.
episodes.title: Oscar and the Oscarbots / Picture Day

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Macklemore catches a case of the Sing-A-Longs and can't stop singing; A Ms. O from the past risks causing a temporal disruption.
episodes.title: A Case of the Sing-Alongs / Ms. Uh-Oh

episodes.synopsis: In this double-length episode, Olive and Otto are called to Shapely Manor, whose strange occupants are involved in a perplexing case involving shapes.
episodes.title: Crime at Shapely Manor

episodes.synopsis: In the first case of his very own, Otto must find Olive, who's disappeared; Otto races to wrap up a case in time to see his favorite magician.
episodes.title: Skip Day / The Great Grinaldi

episodes.synopsis: Otto accidentally unleashes a horde of small furry creatures on Odd Squad HQ; Ms. O recounts the story of her battle with the sinister Patternista.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Centigurps / Totally Odd Squad

episodes.synopsis: Olive and Otto investigate when characters begin leaping out of library books; A shape-shifting villain steals Ms. O's all-important briefcase.
episodes.title: How to Interrogate a Unicorn / The Briefcase

episodes.synopsis: A feud breaks out over the best seats at Odd Squad; Olive and Otto are worried that agent Obfusco is administering their latest test.
episodes.title: Best Seats in the House / Agent Obfusco

episodes.synopsis: O'Brian is upset with Olive, who must try to figure out what she did wrong; Olive tells Otto the story of Octavia's partner, Oz.
episodes.title: Life of O'Brian / Whatever Happened to Agent Oz?

episodes.synopsis: Ms. O and her team pull out all the stops to win their first Jackie Award; Olive and Otto try to put things right when Ms. O and Oscar switch bodies.
episodes.title: The Jackies / Invasion of the Body Switchers

episodes.synopsis: A plant attack leaves Ms. O suffering from weird symptoms; The sudden return of an old enemy brings Ms. O's former partner out of retirement.
episodes.title: The Odd Antidote / The One That Got Away

episodes.synopsis: A strange medical syndrome breaks out in Odd Squad HQ; Olive and Otto help Ms. O, who's hosting a luncheon for some demanding guests.
episodes.title: Odd Outbreak / The Perfect Lunch

episodes.synopsis: Olive and Otto hunt for Oscar's treasure chest, which holds the key to humanity's survival; The Odd Squad throws a surprise birthday party for Ms. O.
episodes.title: Rise of the Hydraclops / O Is Not for Old

episodes.synopsis: The team must negotiate a series of booby traps to reset the HQ alarm; Olive and Otto have different points of view about where a case went wrong.
episodes.title: Dance Like Nobody Is Watching / Recipe for Disaster

episodes.synopsis: When a new recruit gets lost in the halls of HQ, Otto and Olive must find him before Ms. O finds out; The team confronts Fladam, an anti-cube villain.
episodes.title: Hold the Door / Flatastrophe

episodes.synopsis: Olive and Otto investigate a phenomenon that's turning people into puppets; The Odd Squad looks into a case of missing delivery food.
episodes.title: Puppet Show / Mystic Egg Pizza

episodes.synopsis: In this double-length episode, Olive and Otto travel back in time to prevent the dinosaurs at headquarters from escaping and running amok.
episodes.title: 6:00 to 6:05

episodes.synopsis: Olaf, Olive and Oren hunt for the magical Growing Potato when Otto begins to shrink; Ms. O tells Olive and Otto how she started at Odd Squad.
episodes.title: The Potato Ultimato / A Fistful of Fruit Juice

episodes.synopsis: Members of the band Soundcheck disappear shortly before a big concert; Oscar and Dr. O try to reverse a jinx that's descended on Odd Squad HQ.
episodes.title: Soundcheck Part Deux / Jinx
